titles.title: Commercial Aviation Fuel Tax Exemption Extension Act
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the exemption for commercial aviation from the transportation fuels tax

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S15428-15429)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 12/1/1994--Introduced. Commercial Aviation Fuel Tax Exemption Extension Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to extend the fuel tax exemption for commercial aviation until September 30, 1998.
